description: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = coefficient of x^n*y^k in 1/(1-2*z-2*w+2*z*w) read by rows in order 00, 10, 01, 20, 11, 02, ...
comments: Pascal-like triangle: start with 1 at top; every subsequent entry is the sum of everything above you, plus 1.
crossrefs: See A059576 for a similar triangle.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 03, 2001; revised Jun 12 2005
